New Service

Cancel

The Discovery API lets you register a service. You can try this out yourself. In your interpreter, type:

import datawire
datawire.register(‘servicename’,’owner’,TOKEN_ID, physical_address)

Pending registration. Excecute code to register the service.

import datawire
datawire.register(‘servicename’,’owner’,TOKEN_ID, physical_address)

Servicename has been registered by owner.

Continue
Skip Tutorial

That's it

You’ve registered your first service, started a running service, and seen how you connect to your running service via service discovery. What’s next?
